I began my venture into photography in 2014, at the beginning of high school and soon became obsessed with the fundamentals that make a great photograph: lighting, balance, composition and use of space. Specifically, I fell in love capturing people. Their emotions, triumphs and trials. From sports photography to portraiture, I fell in love with telling stories through pictures.

I would love the opportunity to capture the special moments in your life with a sense of creativity. I give my best effort to offer an exceptional personal service for each and every one of my clients. Get in touch today and book your session!
